# mgc_container_registries (Resource)

Manages a Container Registry

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "mgc_container_registries" "registry" {
  name           = "my_registry"
  proxy_cache_id = "proxy_cache_id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the registry

### Optional

- `proxy_cache_id` (String) The ID of the proxy cache associated with this registry

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the registry
